goals.title: Shadow-Live Runner (Fixture-Proven) + Live WebSocket Mode
goals.objective: Create a shadow-live runner that can be proven offline using fixtures, while also supporting a real Polymarket market WebSocket mode (not run in offline proofs).
constraints: Offline proof suites must remain offline by default (no fetch/WebSocket).
Shadow-live runner must never place/cancel orders (read-only).
Status output must be stable JSON with top-of-book, inventory, live orders, kill-switch, and desired quotes.
deliverables: Add packages/mm-core/src/runner/shadowEngine.js (pure) to maintain orderbook + trackers and compute status snapshots.
Add scripts/run-shadow-live.mjs supporting: --mode fixture (offline) and --mode live (WebSocket).
Add tests/sim/shadowLiveCli.test.mjs that runs the CLI in fixture mode and writes artifacts/proofs/latest/suite/sim/shadow-live-cli.json.
